entries.description: SAM: Added support for Java 21 Lambda runtime
AWS Lambda: AWS Explorer command palette actions and hover buttons to build, local invoke, deploy, and remote invoke
AWS Lambda: Improved local test and debug and remote invoke to streamline creating and sharing sample events
AWS Lambda: 'Application Builder' is a new sidebar view for viewing application resources and links to create, build, debug, and test serverless applications
SAM: Added support for Ruby 3.3 Lambda runtime
SAM: Added support for Ruby 3.2 Lambda runtime
AWS Lambda: Guided walkthrough contains links to set up local IDE environment, install required tools, several starter templates, and guidance on how to get started building serverless applications
SAM: Added support for .NET 8.0 Lambda runtime
